title: Murray River trip per 'Marion' July 1940

description: Home movie of trip taken along the Murray River in July 1940 showing picturesque sights along the journey including the almond blossoms and oranges at Berri, South Australia; the junction of the Murray and Darling Rivers near Wentworth; the many lochs between Mildura to Morgan; paddle-steamers and a sunset on the Murray.
